meaningMnemonic: You know how 携帯 refers to a mobile phone? This is a <kanji>strap</kanji> (ストラップ) for a mobile phone, making this a <vocabulary>cell phone strap</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>mobile phone strap</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own. Will help to know the reading of 携帯.
